sentences.en: ...young warriors, eager to shed blood.
sentences.cn: …渴望洒热血的年轻武士们。

sentences.en: a cattle shed
sentences.cn: 牛棚

sentences.en: a diet to help you shed pounds
sentences.cn: 帮助你减肥的食谱

sentences.en: A lorry piled with scrap metal had shed its load.
sentences.cn: 一辆载满废金属的卡车掉货了。

sentences.en: a tool shed
sentences.cn: 工具棚

sentences.en: As it grows, a snake will regularly shed its skin .
sentences.cn: 蛇在成长的过程中会定期蜕皮。

sentences.en: As rural factories shed labour, people drift towards the cities.
sentences.cn: 由于农村的工厂纷纷裁员，人们逐渐流向城市。

sentences.en: Deciduous trees shed their leaves in autumn.
sentences.cn: 落叶树木在秋天落叶.

sentences.en: Deer shed their antlers each year.
sentences.cn: 鹿每年都蜕角.

sentences.en: He built a bicycle shed.
sentences.cn: 他盖了一间自行车棚.

sentences.en: He strode across the bathroom, shedding wet clothes as he went.
sentences.cn: 他大步走过浴室，边走边把湿衣服脱下来。

sentences.en: His nose told him that he was getting near the cow shed.
sentences.cn: 他的嗅觉告诉他,他正走近牛棚.

sentences.en: I didn't shed a single tear.
sentences.cn: 我一滴眼泪也没掉。

sentences.en: I wonder what those children are after in that shed.
sentences.cn: 我不知道那些孩子在棚子里寻找什么.

sentences.en: Let's put up a shed here for the time being.
sentences.cn: 我们暂时在这里搭个棚 吧.

sentences.en: Many trees shed their leaves in autumn.
sentences.cn: 许多树在秋天落叶.

sentences.en: Mother went home. Many a tear did she shed at night.
sentences.cn: 母亲回家了, 晚上她流了许多泪.

sentences.en: She shed no tears when she heard he was dead.
sentences.cn: 她听到他的死讯时没流一滴眼泪。

sentences.en: The candles shed a soft glow on her face.
sentences.cn: 蜡烛在她的脸上映着一层柔光。

sentences.en: The company is planning to shed about a quarter of its workforce.
sentences.cn: 这家公司正计划裁减约四分之一的人员。

sentences.en: The group has already shed 10,000 jobs.
sentences.cn: 该集团已经裁去1万个工作岗位。

sentences.en: The magazine is desperately trying to shed its old-fashioned image.
sentences.cn: 这份杂志急于摆脱其过时的形象。

sentences.en: The three of us manhandled the uncovered dinghy out of the shed.
sentences.cn: 我们三个人把无篷小划艇推出了棚子。

sentences.en: The trees were starting to shed their leaves .
sentences.cn: 树木开始落叶了。

sentences.en: There are a lot of straws in the shed.
sentences.cn: 棚子里有许多稻草.

sentences.en: Too much blood has already been shed in this conflict.
sentences.cn: 这次冲突已经造成太多的伤亡了。

sentences.en: Vegetarianism has shed its cranky image.
sentences.cn: 素食主义者已经摆脱了其古怪的形象。

words.tran_cn: 脱壳期的虾和蟹；使流出的人；倒注者

phrases.tran_cn: 杀：夺走生命，尤指以暴力；杀死

trans.tran_cn: 简易房，棚（用于贮藏物品），工棚，库房
trans.tran_en: a small building, often made of wood, used especially for storing things

trans.tran_cn: 去除，摆脱，使落下，蜕，落，流，洒，掉落（货物），使流（血）
trans.tran_en: to get rid of something that you no longer need or want
to drop something or allow it to fall

trans.tran_cn: 脱落，脱去；流出，流下；发出，散发；摆脱，去掉，去除
trans.tran_en: to get rid of something that you no longer need or want
